title: Humiliated by Her Master: Public Humiliation, Spanking and Exhibitionism for a Wet Young Woman
description: Imagine being sexually humiliated by your employer--in front of your family.At the height of the Great Depression, a close-knit African American family struggles to survive by working as shareholders for the wealthy planter Mr. Dobes. Laura is the nineteen-year-old daughter with a body every man covets, and the white men are no exception. When she becomes visibly aroused while working the fields, Mr. Dobes's son decides to spank her with his belt while her family watches on in horror.Laura has never been so humiliated, especially in front of her employer and every member of her family--until the planter's son decides to do something more.Previously Spanked by the Planter's Son.
author: Elizabeth Barton-Toile
